metadata.description: An Amethyst gemstone that only exists on the Ethereum blockchain. A commemorative token for the purchase of Malt, Grain & Cane's Curated Range bottlings (Year 2). Upon closer inspection of this gemstone, a Powerful rush of emotions flow through you, leaving you with a bad mixture of melancholy, terrible longing, and nostalgia for a nearly-forgotten someone. The temptation is there, but you resist the Powerful urge to reach back out to them.
metadata.name: Amethyst #1
